name: media_playNext
description: This function is used to play the next track or episode on a SmartThings device.

parameters.name: location
parameters.description: The location where the device is located.

parameters.name: room
parameters.description: The room where the device is located.

parameters.name: device
parameters.description: The name or type of the device to play the next track or episode.

parameters.name: predefinedCompartment
parameters.description: The predefined compartment to play the next track or episode.

parameters.name: appname
parameters.description: The app name to play the next track or episode.

parameters.name: predefinedAppName
parameters.description: The predefined app name to play the next track or episode.

parameters.name: title
parameters.description: The title to play the next track or episode.

parameters.name: cast
parameters.description: The cast to play the next track or episode.
